page.title: 20THE PLAYGROUP
page.content: THE PLAYGROUP IN CROWLE MEETS A FEW MORNINGS EACH WEEK. THE CHILDREN ARE FOUR YEARS OLD AND ENJOY MANY ACTIVITIES, LIKE PAINTING, BUILDING BRICKS, SAND, WATER, JIGSAWS, DOLLS AND A PLAY HOUSE. SOMETIMES THE CHILDREN GO OUT TO THE PARK OR ON A TRIP. THEY LEARN HOW TO SHARE TOYS AND GET ALONG TOGETHER AS PART OF THEIR SOCIAL TRAINING FOR SCHOOL. SOME CHILDREN DO NOT WANT TO LEAVE THEIR MTHERS AND CRY FOR A LONG TIME BEFORE THEY SETTLE AND FIND SOMETHING THAT INTERESTS THEM. OTHERS LIKE MEETING SMALL CHILDREN AND PLAYING TOGETHER. THEY HAVE FUND RAISING EVENTS AND COMPETITIONS TO ENABLE THE PLAYGROUP TO CONTINUE.
